text: Richard Höger (born 17 August 1972) is a Slovak former footballer and coach. ==Honours== ;Slovan Bratislava *Slovak Super Liga: 1998–99 *Slovak Cup: 1996–97, 1998–99 ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Czechoslovak footballers Category:1.
